## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATPAO2, PAO2</u>
- **Gene Name:** polyamine oxidase 2, polyamine oxidase 2
- **Description:**   polyamine oxidase 2;(source:Araport11)
- **Description:**   Derives_from AT2G43020;(source:Araport11)
